description:
Excel to FlatBuffers tool.
Only list some flatc options, the complete option list please refer to https://flatbuffers.dev/flatc/
commonFlatcOptions: List some commonly used flatc options
input: Excel file path or directory path
output: Output file path, default to current directory
namespace: Namespace for generated code, default to 'xlsx'
censoredFields: Censored fields, use `,` to connect, will generate a censored version of the file to the `output_censored/` directory
censoredTable: Censored table, should not output to `output_censored/` directory
censoredOutput: Censored table output path, default to `${output}_censored/`
outputBin: Copy the output bin to the specified path, only available for batching
outputCsharp: Copy the output code to the specified path, for example, C#, only available for batching
censoredOutputBin: Copy the censored output bin to the specified path, only available for batching
censoredOutputCsharp: Copy the censored output code to the specified path, for example, C#, only available for batching
cleanOutput: Force clear the output directory before batching, use with caution
defaultKey: If the table does not set the key property, use this field as the key, not set then not use key attribute
propertyOrder: Custom property sheet order, default ABCDE
multiThread: Multi-thread number when batching, default to 4
allowWildTable: Allow wild-table (tables not configured in $tables.xlsx) when batching, default to false
emptyString: The string type field in the table will be filled with an empty string instead of null when creating a binary
disableMergeTable: Disable the merge table feature when batching
disableIncremental: Disable the incremental feature when batching
enableStreamingRead: Enable streaming read of .xlsx format, fast, small memory, but Not OK for Chinese
binaryExtension: The extension of output binary file, default to .bin
deleteFbs: Delete the generated .fbs file after conversion
generateJson: Generate JSON file from the output FlatBuffer
tableClassSuffix: The suffix of table class, default to empty string
dataClassSuffix: The suffix of table data class, default to Info
legacyMode: Legacy mode, only output the original JSON file
csharpUnityLoaderSuffix: The suffix of Unity table loader class, default to Table
jsExcludeFlatbuffers: Exclude FlatBuffers code from js bundle
successGenerateCSharpUnityLoader: Successfully generate Unity table loader class
warningSignedNumberType: ⚠️ Warning: There are signed numbers in the table, please check the table data
warningFloatNumberType: ⚠️ Warning: There are floating-point numbers in the table, please check the table data
warningNumberTypeRange: ⚠️ Warning: The range of number types is too large, please check the table data
warningNumberTypeOverflow: ⚠️ Warning: The number type overflows the given type, please check the table data
warningInferNumberTypeOverSafe: ⚠️ Warning: The inferred value exceeds the JS precision limit, automatically use float64
warningInferNumberTypeBool: ⚠️ Warning: The inferred value is a bool type, please configure bool in the table to eliminate this warning
warningWildTable: ⚠️ Warning: Wild table (tables not configured in $tables.xlsx)
warningDuplicateTable: ⚠️ Warning: Duplicate table name in the path, which table do you want to convert?
warningTablesConfigNotFound: ⚠️ Warning: $tables.xlsx not found, default to convert all, duplicate name will cause conversion failure
warningReservedKeyword: ⚠️ Warning: The name contains reserved keywords, please change the name
warningMissingFlatcOptions: ⚠️ Warning: Flatc options not provided, only generate .fbs file
warningUnityIdType: ⚠️ Warning: When generating Unity loader class, the id field type is forced to int
warningInvalidField: ⚠️ Warning: Invalid field name, please check the field name, avoid conflict with the code interface
errorInvalidInput: ❌ Error: Input parameter error, please check the input parameter
errorInvalidPropertyOrder: ❌ Error: --property-order parameter must be a 5-character string representing table columns, like ABCDE
errorInvalidRootDir: ❌ Error: Tables root directory not found
errorTablesRootNotFound: ❌ Error: Tables root directory not found
errorTableInvalid: ❌ Error: Invalid table format, please check if the table format is correct, the table must contain data sheet and property sheet
errorTableNotSupport: ❌ Error: Table format not supported, please check if the input is correct
errorGenerateFbs: ❌ Error: Failed to generate .fbs file, please check if the table property sheet (order) is correct
errorInvalidDefaultValue: ❌ Error: Invalid default value, please check if the default value is correct
errorFbsNotFound: ❌ Error: The .fbs file to be converted does not exist
errorGenerateCode: ❌ Error: Failed to generate script from fbs
errorInvalidNumberValue: ❌ Error: Invalid number value, please check the table data
errorFlatcGenerateFailed: ❌ Error: Failed to generate bin from fbs
errorNeedAllSuccessToPostProcess: ❌ Error: Need all tables to be converted successfully before post processing, please fix the errors first
errorClassSuffixConflict: ❌ Error: Table class and data class suffix conflict, please change the table class or data class suffix
errorESBuildFailed: ❌ Error: Failed to generate js bundle from ts
errorSubTableSheetMissing: ❌ Error: Sub-table data sheet and property sheet mismatch, please check if the table format is correct
errorSubTableNotFound: ❌ Error: Sub-table not found, please check if the table format is correct
errorEnumDefaultValueMissing: ❌ Error: Enum type missing default value, please configure the default value
errorEnumNotFound: ❌ Error: Enum type not found, please check if the table format is correct
errorStructNotFound: ❌ Error: Struct type not found, please check if the table format is correct
errorMultipleKeyField: ❌ Error: Table contains multiple key attribute fields, please fix it
